short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage discount/promo codes for web sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Corporate discounts. Auto club discounts. Retirement organisation discounts.
How do you track the discounts to which you are entitled?

Discount Manager!

Visit a site that provides a discount and enter the organisations and discount codes for that site. You can also add a comment for each discount code (optional). Save the information and the next time that you visit the site, your codes are easily accessible from Discount Manager. In addition, a bookmark (favourite) is created for each site in your "Other Bookmarks ... Discount Manager" folder.

*** Features ***

•  Add as many discount codes as you want for each site
•  Copy a discount code to the clipboard using the copy icon
•  A badge on the action icon displays the number of codes entered for a site
•  Import / export the Discount Manager database
•  Organise the site's bookmark by assigning a category
•  Open the user guide by clicking on the Discount Manager logo at the top of one of the windows

*** Options ***

•  Comments (on the popup page) can be displayed in a tooltip when you hover over the code, displayed at the bottom of the page, or both (default).
•  The add / modify site page can be displayed in a popup window or in a new tab (default).
long.en_US:
Corporate discounts. Auto club discounts. Retirement organisation discounts. How do you track the discounts to which you are entitled? Discount Manager! Visit a site that provides a discount and enter the organisations and discount codes for that site. You can also add a comment for each discount code (optional). Save the information and the next time that you visit the site, your codes are easily accessible from Discount Manager. In addition, a bookmark (favourite) is created for each site in your "Other Bookmarks ... Discount Manager" folder. *** Features ***
  • Add as many discount codes as you want for each site
  • Copy a discount code to the clipboard using the copy icon
  • A badge on the action icon displays the number of codes entered for a site
  • Import / export the Discount Manager database
  • Organise the site's bookmark by assigning a category
  • Open the user guide by clicking on the logo in one of the windows
*** Options ***
  • Comments (on the popup page) can be displayed in a tooltip when you hover over the code, displayed at the bottom of the page, or both (default).
  • The add / modify site page can be displayed in a popup window or in a new tab (default).
